mapper.insert: insert into user(id, name, age, gender, address, phone, birthday, create_time, modify_time) values(#{id},#{name},#{age},#{gender},#{address},#{phone}, #{birthday},#{createTime},#{modifyTime})

insert into user(id, name, age, gender, address, phone, birthday, create_time, modify_time) values
(#{item.id},#{item.name},#{item.age},#{item.gender},#{item.address},#{item.phone}, #{item.birthday},#{item.createTime},#{item.modifyTime})
